page.title: 04Haverfordwest Schools (1)
page.content: Tasker Milward is a Comprehensive SChool which educates children aged 11-18 years. It was formed 8 years ago from the amalgamation of the two Grammar Schools, hence the split campus,the lower and upper schools. It educates about 1,000 pupils in all subjects. Pupils who are capable take the Welsh Joint Education Committee's Examinations in C.S.E.,G.C.E. O'level, and A'level.This system is soon to be replaced by the G.C.S.E. system. The school has a swimming pool, fields, playgrounds and gymnasiums. The Pembrokeshire Technical College provides courses for students of 16+ in Catering, Engineering, Business Studies and Hairdressing. There is a centre for Further Education at Tower Hill, where afternoon and evening classes are held in various subjects including art, languages, crafts, etc.
